languageApp.title: Multilingual Learning Support Web App using YouTube Subtitles and Generative AI
languageApp.intro: A language learning site that utilizes otaku content, enabling subtitle comparison, AI explanation generation, and progress management and sharing.

testDataTool.title: Test Data Generation Tool
testDataTool.intro: A tool that automatically retrieves DB table definitions and collaborates with AI to generate SQL statements for test data.

reviewTool.title: Code Review Support Tool
reviewTool.intro: Extracts only the modification differences between two Git branches and outputs them as text files that are easy for AI to handle.

chineseTool.title: Chinese Learning Tool
chineseTool.intro: A GUI application that enables efficient learning, confirmation, and recording of Chinese vocabulary.
